name: Paul Gastin
content: Laboratoire Spécification et Vérification Paul Gastin Professor, ENS Paris-Saclay Selected Publications. See also DBLP Slides of some recent talks GPG public key Teaching Algorithmic Formal Languages Basics of Verification Non-Sequential Theory of Distributed Systems Outils / Tools LTL2BA 1.3 : fast translation from LTL formulae to Büchi automata. Version of 2020/06/10 gastex 3.1 : Graphs and Automata Simplified in TeX. Version of 2024/02/12 Nestify 1.0 : nested words for higher order pushdown automata.
